data.comment: The match is underway in Leeds.
The match is underway in Leeds.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Luke Ayling.
Huddersfield's Richard Stearman has been booked in Leeds.
Luke Ayling (Leeds) has received a first yellow card.
Chris Willock (Huddersfield) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
At Elland Road, Gaetano Berardi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Christopher Schindler (Huddersfield) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Patrick Bamford extends Leeds's lead to 2-0.
Steve Mounie is replacing Fraizer Campbell for Huddersfield at Elland Road.
Danny Cowley is making the team's second substitution at Elland Road with Alex Pritchard replacing Chris Willock.
Huddersfield make their third substitution with Juninho Bacuna replacing Emile Smith-Rowe.
The home team have replaced Patrick Bamford with Tyler Roberts. This is the first substitution made today by Marcelo Bielsa.
Ben White is booked for the home team.
The home team replace Mateusz Klich with Jamie Shackleton.
Ezgjan Alioski is on a sub for Jack Harrison for Leeds.
